item.description: Massachusetts Liberty Preservation Association and The John Birch Society are hosting this meeting.  Speakers will be Dave Kopacz and Hal Shurtleff.  Dave is the conservation officer for the Town of Ware, MA.  He will discuss how local boards and land trusts are implementing Agenda 21.  Hal Shurtleff will give an overview of Agenda 21 from the 1992 Rio Conference to present day.  Both men will give sound solutions in getting Agenda 21 out of your community
item.how_to_find_us: We will be using the meeting room
item.name: Agenda 21 and the ICLEI-An Expose
